issue.title: [CF 252] Internal Cooldown not working
issue.body:
I really can't seem to get the internal cooldown icon type to work.

I'm afraid I couldn't say when this happened, I've not been playing for some weeks.

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sicd ^SName^S92346:~`90 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N44312^^

/shrug?


> Posted by CurseForge user warriorjedi | Imported from CurseForge issue #252 | Raw

comments.body:
^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sicd ^SShowWhen^Sunalpha ^SFakeHidden^B ^SName^S92345:90 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N44312^^

Deleted and remade it, as you can see its quite different. No idea what happened to it. Presumably an update broke it, I don't think I did :s

Sorted anyway!


> Posted by CurseForge user warriorjedi

You are using a different spellID between the first and second icons, one has always hide checked and the other doesnt, and one is set to show when usable while the other is set to show when unusable.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
